original_text: But only the high priest entered the inner room, and that only once a year, and never without blood, which he offered for himself and for the sins the people had committed in ignorance.
korean_text: 오직 둘째 장막은 대제사장이 홀로 일 년에 한 번 들어가되 자기와 백성의 허물을 위하여 드리는 피 없이는 아니하나니

sentences.original_text: But only the high priest entered the inner room
and that only once a year
and for the sins the people had committed in ignorance
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들이 무지当中 범한 죄를 위해 바쳐졌다
